---
title: "protocol_33"
---

Protocol_33.m  - short protocol with low luminance 60 degree grating and
flicker.
GS_VAL = 3, on value = 3, off value = 0.
Includes:
- off background interval - pattern 47
- 60 deg gratings - 1 speed
- 60 deg flicker - 1 speed
20s interval
30s trial duration - 2x15s trials

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 2 |
| Patterns Used | 4 |
| t_acclim_start | 30s |
| t_acclim_end | 30s |
| t_interval | 20s |
| t_flash | 5s |
| t_pause | 0.01 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 64](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_64.qmd) | 64 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 4Hz - low luminance |
| 2 | [Pattern 65](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_65.qmd) | 8 | 15s | Flicker - 4Hz |
